title: About
content: Hi! I am a Ph.D. student advised by Prof. Fangming Liu at the School of Computer of Science and Technology, Huazhong University of Science and Technology, China. My research interests include edge computing and green computing. I received my B.Sc. degree from the School of Mathematics, Hunan University, China. During 2019 - 2020, I was a visiting Ph.D. student at the HPDC group, the Department of Computer Science, Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam, The Netherlands.
